clinical_study.brief_title: BIS of Sedation Depth During Flexible Bronchoscopy.
clinical_study.official_title: Bispectral Index Monitoring of Sedation Depth During Flexible Bronchoscopy: With or Without Fentanyl .

lead_sponsor.agency: Nanjing First Hospital, Nanjing Medical University

clinical_study.source: Nanjing First Hospital, Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: Fentanyl is analgesia medication. There has not pain nerve in the lung. Flexible bronchoscopy(FB) is used in the respiratory medicine. So people will not feel pain in the process of FB. The purpose of the study is to know if Fentanyl is useful in the conscious sedation of FB.

detailed_description.textblock:
Fentanyl is opioid receptor agonists. It is a fast-acting, short duration and potent analgesics.
Flexible bronchoscopy (FB) is mostly used in the diagnosis and therapy in the respiratory disease. As we know, there has not pain nerve in the lung. People will not feel pain when they are in FB.
If fentanyl will be effective in FB? Our study will observe the effect of conscious sedation in FB with fentanyl or without fentanyl.

primary_outcome.time_frame: every 5 minutes from the operation beginning to end
primary_outcome.description: For each patient,bispectral index monitoring after anesthesia. Bp will be measured.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the operation beginning to end
secondary_outcome.description: For each patient, record the time bronchoscopy in and out

secondary_outcome.time_frame: in the process of the operation
secondary_outcome.description: For each patient, Adverse events (overall intraoperative cough,bleeding,low oxygen solution) will be record in the operation
One day after the patient do the bronchoscopy, ask him/her about the satisfaction to the operation

arm_group.description: In the Bispectral Index monitoring,our study will use midazolam, propofol and fentanyl in the conscious sedation of FB
In the Bispectral Index monitoring, our study will use midazolam, propofol in the conscious sedation of FB

intervention.description: Five minutes before the patients is done the flexible bronchoscopy, fentanyl will be intravenous injected.
Five minutes before the patients is done the flexible bronchoscopy, midazolam will be intravenous injected.
Propofol will be intravenous injected as soon as the flexible bronchoscopy begins.
Bispectral Index monitoring will be used in the process of the flexible bronchoscopy.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Cough reflex is good agree to do bronchoscopy agree to take part in the study no the contraindication of bronchoscopy
Exclusion Criteria:
Forced expiratory volume in one second<1 L severe hemoptysis severe heart, liver,kidney failure psychiatric and nervous disorders allergic to the anesthetic ( fentanyl, midazolam, or propofol)
